Lead "Surprise Audits" and whistle-blower investigations. Identify loopholes in the ERP system that could lead to financial leakage. আন্তর্জাতিক কুরআন তিলাওয়াত প্রতিযোগিতায় অংশগ্রহণের সনদ থাকতে হবে। নূরানী প্রশিক্ষণপ্রাপ্ত, কিরাত ও উলূমুল কুরআনে উচ্চতর ডিগ্রি (দেশ/বিদেশ) থাকলে অগ্রাধিকার। কম্পিউটার ও একাডেমিক ডকুমেন্টেশনে দক্ষতা থাকতে হবে। উত্তম চরিত্র, আমানতদার ও সুন্নাহপরায়ণ হতে হবে। কমপক্ষে ৫ বছর হিফয বিভাগে দায়িত্বশীল হিসেবে কাজ করার অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। বয়সসীমা সর্বোচ্চ ৪০ বছর। Responsibilities & Context প্রার্থীকে নিম্নলিখিত দায়িত্ব পালন করতে হবে: হিফয বিভাগের সর্বোচ্চ মান নিশ্চিত করা এবং সংশ্লিষ্ট সকল শিক্ষকের পাঠদানের মান নিয়মিত যাচাই করা। শিক্ষার্থীদের সহীহ, মানসম্মত ও দ্রুত হিফয সম্পন্নের কার্যকরী পরিকল্পনা গ্রহণ ও বাস্তবায়ন করা। হিফয বিভাগে শিক্ষক-শিক্ষার্থীদের নিয়মিত উপস্থিতি নিশ্চিত করা। প্রতিটি হিফয ক্লাস নিয়মিত ভিজিট করা। কায়েদা → আম্মাপারা → নাযেরা → হিফয স্তরে উত্তীর্ণের মান যাচাই করে প্রিন্সিপাল বরাবর রিপোর্ট প্রদান করা। নিয়মিত মাশক ক্লাস পরিচালনা করা। জাতীয় ও আন্তর্জাতিক কুরআন তিলাওয়াত প্রতিযোগিতার জন্য শিক্ষার্থীদেরকে প্রস্তুত করা এবং অংশ গ্রহণের খোঁজ খবর রাখা। মাসিক অগ্রগতি রিপোর্ট প্রস্তুত ও উপস্থাপন করা। দুর্বল শিক্ষার্থীদের জন্য বিশেষ পরিকল্পনা গ্রহণ করা। অভিভাবকদের সাথে নিয়মিত যোগাযোগ রাখা। হিফয বিভাগের বার্ষিক কর্মপরিকল্পনা প্রণয়ন। শিক্ষকদের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় প্রশিক্ষণ ও উন্নয়নমূলক কর্মশালার আয়োজন করা। শিক্ষার্থীদের আদব-আখলাক ও তারবিয়াহ এর বিষয়গুলো তত্ত্বাবধান করা। শিক্ষার্থীদের সঠিক মূল্যায়ন, ফলাফল বিশ্লেষণ ও মান উন্নয়নে পরিকল্পনা গ্রহণ করা। প্রতিষ্ঠানের নীতিমালা মেনে চলা এবং সামগ্রিক বিষয়ে প্রতিষ্ঠান প্রধানকে রিপোর্ট করা। Compensation & Other Benefits বছরে ২টি ঈদ বোনাস। ৬ মাস পর চাকরি স্থায়ী হওয়ার সুযোগ। প্রতিবছর ইনক্রিমেন্ট। প্রভিডেন্ট ফান্ড সুবিধা। job_description: Senior Officer - Women`s Economic Empowerment Project : Save the Children Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Save the Children Senior Officer - Women`s Economic Empowerment Project Application Deadline : 07 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Published: 01 Mar 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements At least 3 years of experience preferably in women’s economic empowerment, youth livelihoods, or workforce development program. Demonstrated understanding and competency in project implementation, management, and monitoring. Sound knowledge of relevant Government of Bangladesh policies related to SMEs, entrepreneurship development, digital skills, youth development, and GESI. Proven experience in implementing skills training and youth development programs, entrepreneurship development initiatives, soft skills training, stakeholder engagement, private sector collaboration including business corporations and chambers of commerce, as well as internal and external communication. Report writing both Bangla in English, analyse data for decision making and participation. Digital Marketing and Ecommerce Proficiency in Microsoft Office and basic digital tools of Artificial Intelligence and soft skills expertise Responsibilities & Context Contract Type: Fixed Term Regular (Till December 2027) | Save the Children invites applications for the above-mentioned position. We are committed to equal employment opportunities, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, colour, ethnic origin, nationality, disability, age, or beliefs and religion. We are committed to diversifying our staff to better represent the communities we serve and actively welcome underrepresented groups to apply. The Opportunity The project aims to strengthen the economic resilience of disadvantaged young women in Bangladesh, through market-relevant skills development, digital and vocational training, job placement, entrepreneurship, financial inclusion, and gender-transformative approaches that address structural barriers and restrictive social norms. The Senior Officer will provide technical leadership and hands-on support to ensure high-quality, market-aligned, and gender-transformative implementation of the project. The role focuses on strengthening technical design, implementation quality, partner capacity, and learning related to women’s economic empowerment, youth employability, entrepreneurship, and enabling environments. She/he will work across country teams and implementing partners to ensure that interventions remain aligned with labor market demand, donor commitments, and Save the Children’s Youth Economic Empowerment Framework. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Livelihood Programming Project Implementation Women Empowerment Employment Status Full Time Job Locati

Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 30 years Certification in Pharmaceutical Sales (preferred) Strong knowledge of new pharmaceutical products and medical supplies Experience in handling prescriptions and over-the-counter medications Ability to interact effectively with customers and provide guidance on medication usage Good communication and sales skills to promote pharmacy products Knowledge of inventory management and stock control Basic proficiency in computer applications and pharmacy management software Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks efficiently Experience: 2 to 3 years of experience in Hospital Based pharmaceutical sales, retail pharmacy, or a related field Responsibilities & Context Aurora Specialized Hospital , located in Kakrail, Dhaka, is seeking a qualified and experienced Pharmacy Salesman to join our healthcare team. Location: 19/1 Kakrail, Dhaka-1000 Responsibilities: Assist customers in purchasing medicines and medical supplies based on prescriptions and needs. Follow hospital policies and pharmaceutical regulations while dispensing medicines. Promote pharmacy products and services, enhancing customer engagement. Assist in maintaining a clean, organized, and compliant pharmacy environment. Stay updated on new pharmaceutical products and industry trends. Maintain re-order level of Medicine. job_description: Engineer, Operations : Confidence Power and Energy PLC. (Concern of Confidence Group) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Confidence Power and Energy PLC. (Concern of Confidence Group) Engineer, Operations Application Deadline : 02 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Competency Requirements Technical Competencies Strong knowledge of HFO-based power plant operations. Hands-on experience with engine sets, STG, WHRB, substations, and auxiliary systems. Ability to analyse operational data and equipment performance trends. Knowledge of electrical systems including HV/MV/LV operations. Behavioural & Professional Competencies Strong sense of responsibility and accountability. Honest, hardworking, and dependable. Team-oriented with a friendly and cooperative attitude. Ability to work under pressure and during shift duties. Communication Competencies Effective verbal and written communication skills in Bangla and English. Ability to coordinate clearly with internal teams and external stakeholders (e.g., NLDC). IT & Reporting Competencies Proficient in Microsoft Office tools (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint). Familiar with Google Docs, Sheets, and digital reporting tools. Capable of preparing structured operational and MIS reports. Responsibilities & Context Job Purpose To ensure the safe, reliable, and economical operation of the power plant by efficiently managing shift operations, operating plant equipment, maintaining accurate records, and ensuring strict compliance with safety and operational standards. Key Responsibilities Operational Excellence Ensure safe, reliable, and economical operation of the power plant, including proper shift handover and takeover. Manage and oversee shift operations effectively in the absence of the Shift In-Charge. Execute start-up, shutdown, and normal operations of engine sets, Steam Turbine Generator (STG), WHRB, auxiliaries, and associated plant systems. Perform fault diagnosis and take corrective actions to improve plant availability and reliability. Monitor, control, and analyse operating parameters of all running equipment; identify trends and recommend corrective measures. Monitoring, Reporting & Documentation Maintain all control room logbooks accurately, including: Engine Log Energy Meter Log HV/MV/LV Logs Substation Log Alternator Log DC Distribution Log, etc. Prepare and submit daily MIS, generation reports, outage/contracted reports, demand vs. load reports, plant shutdown/trip reports, incident reports, hot work permit reports, and other required documentation. Coordinate and communicate with NLDC for energy reconciliation and demand variation.

Strong knowledge of: C#, .NET Core, Python, or PHP HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React/Angular (optional) SQL Server/MySQL REST APIs Core Competencies Coding proficiency Analytical thinking Team collaboration Continuous learning mindset Responsibilities & Context The Institute of Chartered Accountants of Bangladesh (ICAB) is going to hire talented IT Professionals to strengthen institute’s digital transformation initiatives and enhance institute-wide technological capability. ICAB invites applications from qualified and committed professionals for the following positions in Information Technology (IT) Division: Job Summary The Software Engineer will work on software development for internal systems, web applications, automation tools, and integration of digital platforms across the firm. Key Responsibilities 1 . Backend (C# / .NET) Solid understanding of C# and object-oriented programming (OOP) principles. Hands-on experience with ASP.NET Core for building RESTful APIs. Familiarity with Entity Framework Core (EF Core) or Dapper. Understanding of dependency injection, middleware, and application configuration. Basic knowledge of HTTP concepts (status codes, request/response lifecycle). Basic understanding of authentication concepts (JWT, API security – conceptual level). 2. Frontend (Next.js / React) Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+) or TypeScript. Experience building web applications using React and Next.js. Good knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and modern styling approaches. Experience with UI libraries such as Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI. Basic understanding of state management (Redux, RTK, or Zustand). Familiarity with API integration and handling async data (fetch / axios). 3. Database (Oracle) Experience working with relational databases, specifically Oracle. Ability to write SQL queries (SELECT, JOINs, GROUP BY, WHERE). Basic understanding of database design concepts: Normalization Primary and foreign keys Indexing fundamentals Basic familiarity with Oracle-specific concepts (schemas, sequences). 4. Cloud & DevOps (AWS) Basic familiarity with AWS services such as EC2, S3, and RDS. Understanding of Git version control (branching, merging, pull requests). Exposure to Docker and container-based development. Basic awareness of CI/CD workflows (e.g., GitHub Actions) Skills & Expertise Suggested

job_description: Executive, Local Sourcing - Supply Chain Management : Apex Footwear Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Apex Footwear Limited Executive, Local Sourcing - Supply Chain Management Application Deadline : 31 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 28 to 42 years Location: Gazipur Salary: Negotiable Published: 01 Mar 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 28 to 42 years Only Male Responsibilities & Context Market Exploration & Scouting Conduct extensive market visits across Dhaka, Chittagong, Gazipur, and other sourcing hubs to identify new and innovative materials, components, and accessories. Track emerging local trends, indigenous materials, and technical innovations relevant to export footwear design. New Vendor Development Identify, evaluate, and onboard local suppliers for materials such as leather, textiles, soles, heels, trims, chemical sheets, and specialized footwear components. Perform initial assessments on quality, capacity, compliance, and commercial viability before vendor engagement. Internal Stakeholder Collaboration Act as the key liaison between local vendors and the Design Lab/Product Development teams. Support the creation of cost benchmarks for locally sourced alternatives. Supply Chain Resilience & Localization Develop a diversified and reliable local supply base to reduce dependency on imports and minimize lead time risks. Support strategic initiatives for local value addition aligned with Apex’s export competitiveness agenda. Reporting & Documentation Maintain systematic records of market visits, vendor data, material samples, costing sheets, and sourcing evaluations. Prepare periodic sourcing updates, opportunity assessments, and performance dashboards for SCM leadership. job_title: Vice President & Unit Head, Green Climate Fund (GCF)
job_description: Vice President & Unit Head, Green Climate Fund (GCF) : Infrastructure Development Company Limited (IDCOL) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Infrastructure Development Company Limited (IDCOL) Vice President & Unit Head, Green Climate Fund (GCF) Application Deadline : 15 Mar 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 241921 (Monthly) Published: 01 Mar 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Minimum 11 years of work experience, preferably in banking, financial institutions, or development projects related to energy, renewable energy, or climate-related financing. Strong written, communication, and analytical skills in both Bengali and English. Expertise in economic and financial due diligence for projects. Responsibilities & Context Step into the Country’s Climate Finance Leadership! The Green Climate Fund (GCF) is the world’s largest global climate finance fund under the UN framework, supporting developing countries to reduce carbon emissions and strengthen resilience against climate risks like floods and extreme weather. IDCOL, Bangladesh’s first Direct Access Entity to GCF, channels global climate funds into high impact projects. It has already secured the world’s largest GCF funded private sector project. It is also driving renewable energy, energy efficiency, and climate resilience across the country. Are you ready to shape the future of the country’s climate finance? Key Responsibilities Lead the organization’s engagement with the Green Climate Fund and drive the strategic development, expansion, and delivery of the climate finance portfolio. Proactively identify, originate, and pursue bankable climate projects and programs aligned with national priorities and GCF investment criteria. Oversee preparation and submission of high-quality concept notes, funding proposals, and supporting technical, financial, environmental, and safeguards documentation. Mobilize climate finance resources by collaborating with government entities, the GCF, development partners, private sector entities, and consultants. Ensure effective implementation, monitoring, compliance, and reporting of approved projects in line with GCF standards and requirements. Lead, mentor, and manage the GCF Unit team while strengthening institutional systems, processes, and capacity for climate finance program development and execution. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Fund Management Banks & Financial Strategic Planning Program Management Monitoring Compliance Compensation & Other Benefits Remuneration Package: BDT 241,921 + Festival Bonus + LFA + Gratuity + other benefits as per company policy Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Apply Procedure Apply URL: https://idcol.org/home/vacancies Company Information Infra

Medical Officer : Bangladesh Thalassemia Foundation Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Bangladesh Thalassemia Foundation Medical Officer Application Deadline : 31 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: At least 25 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 01 Mar 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 25 years Only Female BMDC registration is a must. Candidates should have experience in public awareness programs. Experience working in a blood bank or transfusion medicine will be considered an added advantage for the candidate. Responsibilities & Context Conduct medical assessments of inpatients, including history taking, physical examinations, and ordering diagnostic tests for thalassemia patients. Develop and implement individualized treatment plans for thalassemia patients. Determine blood transfusion requirements. Oversee the administration of blood transfusions, ensuring adherence to protocols for patient safety and infection control. Work closely with hematologists, nurses, and other healthcare professionals to provide coordinated and comprehensive care. Participate in multidisciplinary team meetings to discuss patient cases, treatment plans, and discharge planning. Coordinate with laboratory and diagnostic services to ensure timely and accurate test results. Coordinate with administrative staff for patient appointments and scheduling. Monitor patients’ progress, adjust treatments as necessary, and manage any complications or side effects of therapies. Maintain accurate and detailed medical records, including patient histories, treatment plans, progress notes, and discharge summaries. Ensure compliance with hospital policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements regarding documentation and patient care. Stay updated with the latest medical research and advancements in thalassemia care. Aware patients and their families about thalassemia, its complications, and the importance of adherence to treatment plans. Provide counselling and support to help patients and families cope with the chronic nature of the disease. Organize blood donation campaigns that ensure donor safety and education while adhering to regulatory guidelines. Develop and implement educational initiatives to raise awareness about the importance of blood donations, dispelling myths, addressing concerns, and highlighting its life-saving impact through PowerPoint presentations. Work Hours: Our regular work follows a roster with two shifts (8:00 am to 4:00 pm) and (1:00 pm to 09:00 pm). Skills & Expertise Clinical Assessment and Diagnostic Clinical Supervision Infection Prevention and Control Patient Assessment Patient Care Management Patient Counseling Patient monitor

সর্বোচ্চ ৪০ বছর। Responsibilities & Context প্রার্থীকে নিম্নলিখিত দায়িত্ব পালন করতে হবে: আরবি বিভাগের সর্বোচ্চ মান নিশ্চিত করা এবং সংশ্লিষ্ট সকল শিক্ষকের পাঠদানের মান নিয়মিত যাচাই করা। শিক্ষার্থীদের আরবি ভাষা আয়ত্ব করণে কার্যকর পরিকল্পনা গ্রহণ ও বাস্তবায়ন। আরবি বিভাগের শিক্ষকদের নিয়মিত উপস্থিতি ও শৃঙ্খলা তদারকি। নিয়মিত ক্লাস ভিজিট করা ও প্রয়োজনীয় পদক্ষেপ গ্রহণ করা। আরবি বিভাগের বার্ষিক কর্মপরিকল্পনা প্রণয়ন করা। শিক্ষকদের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় প্রশিক্ষণ ও উন্নয়নমূলক কর্মশালার আয়োজন করা। শিক্ষার্থীদেরকে উপজেলা, জেলা, জাতীয় ও আন্তর্জাতিক পর্যায়ের বিভিন্ন আরবি প্রতিযোগিতায় অংশগ্রহণ Marketing & Sales Officer : Al Ali Auto Bricks Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Al Ali Auto Bricks Ltd. Marketing & Sales Officer Application Deadline : 31 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 22 to 45 years Location: Faridpur (Boalmari) Salary: Tk. 20000 (Monthly) Published: 01 Mar 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Additional Requirements Age 22 to 45 years Only Male Geographic Familiarity : Must have strong knowledge of the local geography, markets, and ongoing infrastructure projects in Faridpur, Khulna, Jessore, Barishal, Boalmari, Alfadanga, and surrounding areas. Responsibilities & Context Al Ali Auto Bricks Ltd. is a modernized, semi-automatic brick manufacturing company operating year-round in Boalmari, Faridpur. With a continuous production capacity of approximately 60,000 bricks per day, we are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Marketing & Sales Officer to expand our market footprint. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving the sales of our extensive product range to both corporate (B2B) and individual (B2C) clients, ensuring our high-volume daily output meets consistent and growing market demand. This role requires active field work, client relationship management, and a strong understanding of the local construction materials market. Job Responsibilities: Actively market and sell our full portfolio of brick products and construction materials to both commercial buyers and individual consumers. Identify, develop, and maintain strong relationships with B2B clients (such as construction firms, real estate developers, and contractors) as well as direct B2C customers (such as individual homebuilders and local buyers). Conduct regular field visits across Faridpur and surrounding regions to generate new leads, assess construction sites, and secure direct sales orders from both corporate and retail segments. Meet and consistently strive to exceed monthly sales and revenue targets to ensure the steady outward flow of factory inventory. Our work spans across health (free cleft/cataract surgeries), special education, livelihood support, humanitarian aid (including for Rohingya refugees), and climate resilience. As we embark on an ambitious journey to expand our impact with plans to build a specialized hospital, an orphanage for children with disabilities, and a modern vocational training center we are looking for a passionate and skilled professional to join our dynamic team. Job Summary: The Relationship Officer (Partnership and Communication) is a key strategic role responsible for building and nurturing strong relationships with national and international donors, partners, and sponsors. He/She will be the primary focal point for partnership development and management, donor communication, responsible for showcasing DDEF’s impact through compelling content and securing the resources needed to drive our mission forward. This role is perfect for a master storyteller and a natural networker with a passion for social change.
